text: William Dwight Schultz (born November 24, 1947 in Baltimore, Maryland) is an American stage, television and movie actor. He is known for his roles as Captain "Howling Mad" Murdock on the hit 1980s action show The A-Team, and Reginald Barclay in Star Trek: The Next Generation, Star Trek: Voyager and the movie Star Trek: First Contact and Lester in The Powerpuff Girls. ==Other websites== * Official Website and Forum of Dwight Schultz * * Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Baltimore Category:American bloggers
title: Dwight Schultz
